Haha! O......k..... now you've lost me, why am I an idiot all of a 
sudden? I got back from visiting relatives two days ago, and I've 
been skimming through 300 plus posts and I'm still not done (my 
apologies, but I don't live on the rpg). If you really feel like calling 
me an idiot, then by all means, but keep it private. That way I can 
explain to you why you should be thinking before before making 
yourself look foolish. =) I wouldn't be still RPing if i didn't 
understand transwarp tech. Mighty fine way to make an entrance... 
*frowns*

On 17 Jul 2001, at 21:35, dewboy30816@... wrote:

>  No you idiot. Cyberwolf has given me permission to take Megaton back
> in time(trans-warptechnology can do that duh it was the whole point of
> beast wars) so that he can attack Stallex when he was a baby and
> barely be saved by Mustex. That way in the future Mustex will have a
> rivalry with Megaton, Veratis his creator, and possibly all the
> mutants. This also explains why Mustex first downloaded his Datatracks
> into Stallex(for a second chance if something should happen to 
him).
